channel.title: Help with server admin
channel.description:
OK, so iv just started playing on my private server again after about 7 months and cant remember a thing about java coding because i haven't used it in so long. :| iv found a problem with my server, when i change my admin permissions, my file saves and i still have it while I'm logged in (gold crown as well) and when i log out, for some reason my admin permission disappears and im left with no crown, and it keeps happening, but it never used to happen when i last used the server, everything was perfect, so i need some code to give the permission always when the account name logs in. can anybody help? thanks. ;)
(P.S. i have tried saving while logged off, compiling and all that sort of stuff, iv tried everything in the book, if anybody has any suggestions that i might have missed i would be thankful :))

item.title: Help with server admin
item.dc:creator: @pu123_5k1ll3 pu123 5k1ll3
item.description:
@pu123_5k1ll3 wrote:

well f you coded your server correctly changing all of the playerName.equalsIgnoreCase in your username there is no need since those mean that the character has permission to do that so realy just replace all of the playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name”) to the username you use for owner like playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“webbsta”) and note it may be different but not by that much it should still have the equalsignorecase with the spot to put your name

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server admin

item.description:
